Scopes.title: Scopes
Scopes.description: `Scopes` is a representation of OpenAPI v2 specification's Scopes object. See: https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/3.0.0/versions/2.0.md#scopesObject Lists the available scopes for an OAuth2 security scheme.
